backend/main.mo: Actor defining data types and storing contacts, reservations, events, pages, promotions, and user profiles with access control and rate limiting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata listing admin‑text requirements, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry defining design tokens, dark mode variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing all crawlers and pointing to sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing key site URLs with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup configuring routes, layout, theming, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: UI component showing English‑only admin access‑denied messaging with retry, sign‑out, and home options.
Auth gate handling II login state, admin checks, profile state, and routing to login or access‑denied views.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Login panel prompting Internet Identity sign‑in with loading state UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/backup/Bac: Panel for exporting data to JSON files and importing backups with preview, validation, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/pages/Page: Admin interface to list, create, edit, and delete custom pages with metadata using modal dialogs and mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileSet: Dialog that collects and saves the admin’s name and email using a mutation and shows errors or loading state.
frontend/src/components/admin/promotions: Panel for managing promotional banners, supporting create, edit, reorder, toggle active state, and delete operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/A: Allows configuring WhatsApp, call, and order action buttons, including labels, links, and enabled state.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/S: Admin settings for updating location details and managing opening hours with add and remove actions.
frontend/src/components/branding/Section: Provides styled Section and SectionHeader components with optional pattern, layout spacing, and centered headers.
frontend/src/components/FindUs/GoogleMap: Responsive iframe embedding Google Maps using centralized config.
frontend/src/components/forms/CateringEv: Form for submitting catering event requests with validation, mutation handling, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Simple contact form with validation and async submission using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/forms/Reservatio: Reservation request form validating user details and submitting via mutation with status alerts.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Displays a responsive image grid and opens a lightbox when an image is clicked.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Lightbox modal for viewing gallery images with navigation buttons and keyboard controls.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCat: Grid of predefined featured food categories linking to the menu page.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Site footer showing branding, quick links, contact details, hours, and social links using site settings data.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the site header with dynamic navigation links, logo, and responsive mobile menu using custom pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout including header, promotions strip, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuFilters: Provides tab-based category filters for the menu, allowing selection of predefined categories.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuList.ts: Displays menu items as cards with names, descriptions, prices, and tags, handling empty states.
frontend/src/components/promotions/Promo: Shows active promotions in a dismissible strip ordered by priority.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Exports static site configuration including contact info, address, hours, social links, and metadata.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Contains gallery item definitions and a set of predefined images with captions and categories.
frontend/src/data/menu.ts: Defines menu categories and sample menu items with pricing, descriptions, and tags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPages.ts: Provides mutations for creating, updating, and deleting custom pages with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPromotions.ts: Implements queries and mutations for managing promotions, including add, update, delete, and fetch.
Provides mutations for updating location, opening hours, and button configurations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Provides hooks to check admin status and fetch the current user's profile via actor-based queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRestore.ts: Implements export and import data mutations using the actor, invalidating queries after import.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomPages.ts: Fetches all custom pages or a specific page by slug from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryData.ts: Returns static gallery data while reserving structure for future backend integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and context provisioning.
frontend/src/hooks/useMenuData.ts: Returns static menu categories and items with a query interface for future backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageSeo.ts: Returns static SEO data for a given page key with room for backend integration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePromotions.ts: Fetches active promotions from the actor with placeholder empty data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutations for submitting contact, reservation, and catering forms and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteSettings.ts: Fetches location, opening hours, and button configurations from the actor with fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, and global styles including a pattern utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO setup and sections describing the restaurant’s story, mission, and services.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard with authentication gate, tabbed navigation, and management panels.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with a form, location details, opening hours, and SEO/JSON‑LD setup.
frontend/src/pages/CustomPage.tsx: Loads and displays a custom CMS page by slug with SEO handling and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery page with SEO setup and a grid of fetched gallery items.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage hero, featured categories, and highlights with SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Displays menu items with category filtering and SEO configuration.
frontend/src/pages/OrderReservePage.tsx: Provides reservation and catering request forms via tabbed UI with SEO setup.
frontend/src/seo/LocalBusinessJsonLd.tsx: Generates and injects JSON‑LD schema for restaurant business info using site settings.
frontend/src/seo/seoConfig.ts: Defines default and per‑page SEO configurations using site metadata.
frontend/src/seo/useSeo.ts: React hook that updates document title, meta tags, canonical URL, and social tags based on SEO settings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and persisting or clearing values used for routing or admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project requirements, architecture notes, existing features, and known issues, focused on a mobile-first restaurant site with admin authorization problems.
